title: Author Richard Kent on First U.S. Open Without Federer (Audio)
itunes:title: Author Richard Kent on First U.S. Open Without Federer (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUESTS: Richard Kent, author of "Federer-Nadal," discusses the first US Open without Roger Federer since the 1998 Juniors, as well as look at 6th seeded Venus Williams. Joined by Jeanne Branthover, Partner at executive search company DHR International. Live from the 2016 US Tennis Open in Flushing, Queens NY. Jeanne Branthover Executive Recruiter Dhr Intl Inc Jeanne Branthover, Partner at executive search company DHR International, on job sectors and hiring trends. Live from the 2016 US Tennis Open in Flushing, Queens NY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
